TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi RibbonTwoLineText extends System.Windows.Controls.Control

Docs.summary: Represents a specialized label that can display its contents on one or two lines, with an optional shape displayed inline with the text.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
Gets or sets the amount by which each line of text is offset from the baseline.
Docs.value: The amount by which each line of text is offset from the baseline, in device independent pixels. A value of <xref:System.Double?displayProperty=fullName> indicates that an optimal baseline offset is automatically calculated from the current font characteristics. The default is <xref:System.Double?displayProperty=fullName>.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This property gets or sets the value of the property of the control’s internal . For more information, see . ## Dependency Property Information The baseline is the invisible horizontal line with which the base of each character in a line of text is aligned. ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.DependencyProperty HasTwoLinesProperty

Docs.summary: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTwoLineText.HasTwoLines%2A> dependency property.
Gets or sets the height of each line of content.
Docs.value: The height of each line, in device independent pixels, in the range of 0.0034 to 160000. A value of <xref:System.Double?displayProperty=fullName> indicates that the line height is determined automatically from the current font characteristics. The default is <xref:System.Double?displayProperty=fullName>.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This property gets or sets the value of the property of the control’s internal . For more information, see . ## Dependency Property Information Gets or sets the height of the line set on the internal . ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|

Docs.summary: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTwoLineText.LineHeight%2A> dependency property.
Gets or sets the mechanism by which the line box is determined for each line of content.
Docs.value: One of the enumeration values that specifies how the line box is determined for each line of text. The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks This property gets or sets the value of the property of the control’s internal . For more information, see . ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|

remarks.format: ## Remarks This method is invoked whenever application code or an internal process, such as a rebuilding layout pass, calls the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ApplyTemplate%2A> method.
